article_title: Every GOP Presidential Candidate Wants To Cut The Capital Gains Tax

article_metadata.description: Where do all the Republicans stand on cutting the capital gains tax? They all want to cut it--some to zero, and some to a lower rate than today.
article_metadata.author: Ryan Ellis
